issue.title: Русский фильтр AdGuard (1_optimized.txt) ломает фильтрацию яндекс - рекламы.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11 [54]

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

zoneofgames.ru

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Очередной косяк с вашими фильтрами. Русский фильтр AdGuard (1_optimized.txt) ломает фильтрацию яндекс - рекламы. Конкретно, реклама начинает лезть из-за фильтра
>||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js$script,xmlhttprequest,redirect-rule=noopjs

Ещё в подписках есть подобные фильтры (их там хватает в разных подписках)

>@@||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js$domain=russia-tv.online
>@@||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js|$script,domain=playground.ru

которые попросту пропускают рекламу. Попытка полностью заблокировать непотрество яндекса фильтром "||yandex.ru/ads^" для сайтов, которых нет в исключениях подписок терпит фиаско. Это не работает, даже если отключить все подписки и оставить лишь собственные фильтры. Линки yandex.ru/ads/* в логе даже не маркируются как заблокированные и реклама вполне успешно пролезает.

Какого блин чёрта ?

</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
>А если так? (часть, которая ищет совпадение адреса сделал регулярным выражением) /http/$replace=/a/b/

Идентичное поведение. Вырубаю все свои replace-правила, переделваю одно из своих правил под этот шаблон, проверяю - замена работает. Чекаю boomdown - реклама лезет. Вырубаю правило - реклама перестаёт лезть. Как-то так.

issue.title: youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > When adguard protection is running in the background, opening YouTube in either firefox, edge or chrome will result in the screen being blocked by the mosaic, but as soon as adguard protection is turned off and refresh the page, the screen will return to normal. issue.title: hosting.wialon.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://hosting.wialon.com/?lang=ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhosting.wialon.com%2F%3Flang%3Dru) ### Comment > Некоторые сайты перестали работать или работают частично. Так https://hosting.wialon.com/ не работает, начальная страница загружается с ошибкой, дальше не пропускает совсем. Причем не помогает отключение фильтрации на сайте, только отключение расширения в управлении расширениями. Частично работает icloud.com, а именно нельзя зайти в Фото Почту. ### [NSFW] Screenshots

issue.title: youtube.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.16.0 (4542)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.youtube.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard German filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

It looks like ticket was misunderstood: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/170326

This report is about an unblocked Cookie Pop-up that is normaly handled by this filterlist: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/tree/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections

I did not mention any history whatever profil thing. It's about the Cookie Pop-up

Currently it is not filtered. My previous ticket even has two Thumb up as other users have the same issue.

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

![youtube](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/0323523d-f099-4de1-a116-aceb4d99e00f)

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@Alex-302 

Thats wrong. If **you** want YouTube History without Profile, you can click Update setting and click On afterwards.

![296175702-eeacd453-2b7d-4dd5-a88f-21f2adea0a55](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/0a6ab40f-7277-4461-bd00-272c9a4630ce)

![Screenshot 2024-01-12 094042](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/944b34be-709b-4916-9944-73d3ddac62d8)


Since when AdGuard has become a not privacy focused product anymore?

For years those Cookie Pop-up were autoclicked, giving the user the choice **afterwards** to enable e.g. embedded Twitter, Youtube, Instagram.
This Pop-up is exactly the same and that is one purpose why people install AdGuard.

@AdamWr 
Can you please check? Discussing with Alex is tiring.

comment.body:
Please try this rule instead (2nd rule should normally work if the following rule is applied):
`outlook.live.com#$#div[aria-label^="E"] main > div[class] > div[style] > div[class][style^="position: absolute; left: 0px; top: "][style*="height: 8"][style*="px; width: 100%;"]:has(> div[class]:not([role])) { display: none !important; }`


If that is not working they reapply a display style.

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.16.0 (4542)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.youtube.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

AdGuard Social Media filter

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

_No response_

_No response_

AdGuard German filter

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

It looks like ticket was misunderstood: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/170326

This report is about an unblocked Cookie Pop-up that is normaly handled by this filterlist: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/tree/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections

issue.title: youtube.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.16.0 (4542)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.youtube.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard German filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

It looks like ticket was misunderstood: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/170326

This report is about an unblocked Cookie Pop-up that is normaly handled by this filterlist: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/tree/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections

I did not mention any history whatever profil thing. It's about the Cookie Pop-up

Currently it is not filtered. My previous ticket even has two Thumb up as other users have the same issue.

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

![youtube](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/0323523d-f099-4de1-a116-aceb4d99e00f)

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This rule:
```adblock
youtube.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', 'ytd-consent-bump-v2-lightbox .eom-buttons > .ytd-consent-bump-v2-lightbox > .ytd-consent-bump-v2-lightbox button.yt-spec-button-shape-next')
```
should automatically reject cookie notice.

This one:
```adblock
youtube.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', 'ytd-consent-bump-v2-lightbox .eom-buttons > .ytd-consent-bump-v2-lightbox > .ytd-consent-bump-v2-lightbox:nth-of-type(2) button.yt-spec-button-shape-next')
```
should automatically accept it.

Rejecting cookie is probably better for privacy, but I guess that it might be a bit annoying for some users that they have to change settings to see content on the main page.

comment.body:
On iPhone:

No rules: grey placeholder

---

Only 1 rule from your latest post:

`outlook.live.com#$#div[aria-label^="E"] main > div[class] > div[style] > div[class][style^="position: absolute; left: 0px; top: "][style*="height: 8"][style*="px; width: 100%;"]:has(> div[class]:not([role])) { display: none !important; }`

-> grey placeholder is hidden -> black placeholder from background

---

I wanted to test 2 rules like that, but after adding the second rule, the AdGuard Bug returned on my phone that some Advanced rules stoped working and I need to wait until my phone fixes by itself...

```
outlook.live.com#$#div[aria-label^="E"] main > div[class] > div[style] > div[class][style^="position: absolute; left: 0px; top: "][style*="height: 8"][style*="px; width: 100%;"]:has(> div[class]:not([role])) { display: none !important; }
outlook.live.com#$#div[aria-label^="E"] main > div[class] > div[style] > div[class][style^="position: absolute; left: 0px; top: "][style*="height: 8"][style*="px; width: 100%;"][style*="display: none !important"] ~ div[class] { position: unset !important; }```

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.16.0 (4542)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

Desktop

https://www.youtube.com/

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

_No response_

AdGuard German filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

It looks like ticket was misunderstood: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/170326

This report is about an unblocked Cookie Pop-up that is normaly handled by this filterlist: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/tree/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections

I did not mention any history whatever profil thing. It's about the Cookie Pop-up

Currently it is not filtered. My previous ticket even has two Thumb up as other users have the same issue.

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

![youtube](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/6276915/0323523d-f099-4de1-a116-aceb4d99e00f)

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: So, maybe we can add a rule to reject cookies and if there will be complains about that, then we could change it to accept cookies.

issue.title: Русский фильтр AdGuard (1_optimized.txt) ломает фильтрацию яндекс - рекламы.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11 [54]

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

zoneofgames.ru

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Очередной косяк с вашими фильтрами. Русский фильтр AdGuard (1_optimized.txt) ломает фильтрацию яндекс - рекламы. Конкретно, реклама начинает лезть из-за фильтра
>||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js$script,xmlhttprequest,redirect-rule=noopjs

Ещё в подписках есть подобные фильтры (их там хватает в разных подписках)

>@@||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js$domain=russia-tv.online
>@@||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js|$script,domain=playground.ru

которые попросту пропускают рекламу. Попытка полностью заблокировать непотрество яндекса фильтром "||yandex.ru/ads^" для сайтов, которых нет в исключениях подписок терпит фиаско. Это не работает, даже если отключить все подписки и оставить лишь собственные фильтры. Линки yandex.ru/ads/* в логе даже не маркируются как заблокированные и реклама вполне успешно пролезает.

Какого блин чёрта ?

</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
А эта версия устанавливается? Перед попыткой желательно забэкапить настройки.
https://www.apkmirror.com/apk/adguard-software-limited/adguard/adguard-4-0-64-release/

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

comment.body:
@AdamWr 
I can confirm, both rules working.

IMO:
User who decide to install AdGuard gets what they want. And if subscribing Cookie filter and privacy filter, **my** expectation is that Pop-up gets rejected.
And people are always complaining about youtube, by false using AdGuard or expect that App gets fiiltered. I wouldn't mind.

I still believe in intelligence in people to read the notification why history is turned off and click **Update settings** to turn it On. If they save Cookies -> it stays On.
Most people Log in into profile anyway and will adjust the profile to save history in profile.

But there are also a bunch of users who always browse in private mode for a reason and want share data on minimum (reason for isntalling AG...)

tldr, it's up to you.

@Alex-302 
You can enable history if you like to, see post above.

issue.title: Русский фильтр AdGuard (1_optimized.txt) ломает фильтрацию яндекс - рекламы.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11 [54]

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

zoneofgames.ru

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Очередной косяк с вашими фильтрами. Русский фильтр AdGuard (1_optimized.txt) ломает фильтрацию яндекс - рекламы. Конкретно, реклама начинает лезть из-за фильтра
>||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js$script,xmlhttprequest,redirect-rule=noopjs

Ещё в подписках есть подобные фильтры (их там хватает в разных подписках)

>@@||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js$domain=russia-tv.online
>@@||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js|$script,domain=playground.ru

которые попросту пропускают рекламу. Попытка полностью заблокировать непотрество яндекса фильтром "||yandex.ru/ads^" для сайтов, которых нет в исключениях подписок терпит фиаско. Это не работает, даже если отключить все подписки и оставить лишь собственные фильтры. Линки yandex.ru/ads/* в логе даже не маркируются как заблокированные и реклама вполне успешно пролезает.

Какого блин чёрта ?

</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
До кучи вырубил все свои правила (3 десятка с лишним в сумме) и тройку воткнутых user.js, оставив только replace-правило. Результат тот же. Правило включено - яндекс не фильтруется. Выключено - всё ОК.

>А эта версия устанавливается? Перед попыткой желательно забэкапить настройки.
https://www.apkmirror.com/apk/adguard-software-limited/adguard/adguard-4-0-64-release/

Системный установщик на apk-ку ругаться из-за высокого api не стал (т.е. подходит) и предложил обновиться. Решил, что обновлю чуть позже (на днях) ибо если 4-ка действительно будет работать, то там надо будет ещё помаяться с сертификатом, переносом фильтров и userjs (буду настраивать с нуля и разбирать новый фкнкционал).

Примечательно, что менее месяца назад с саппортом был такой диалог :

>Скажите, у вас для Android 5.1 есть ерсия выше 3.6.1.11/54 ? Ночная/бета/тестовая ?

>На данный момент, поддержка версий Android старше Android 7.0 прекращена. Если у вас работает приложение на версии 3.6.1.11/54 и не предлагает вам обновиться, то значит, что это последняя доступная для вас версия.

Т.е. я тогда честно хотел апдейтнуть adguard, но мне сказали "низзя", ну я и забил. А на деле оказалось, что вполне можно ...

comment.body:
@Alex-302 
I noticed you removed `movieplayer.it` from `No action required`, it looks like also `movieplayer.it#$#html { overflow: visible !important; } ` rule can be removed.
Otherwise, I suggest moving it to
```
! If scrolling is blocked after applying
! #%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.iubenda-cs-customize-btn')
```

issue.title: Getting rid of JS rules, used to set a cookie

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

We have ~317 JS rules, used to set a cookie. They can be found by:
`document.cookie =`
They must be replaced by `set-cookie` / `set-cookie-reload` / `trusted-set-cookie-reload` scriptlet rules.

There are many old rules, so first you need to check if the site is available, and then the need for the rule.

* For convenience, you can work in a separate browser
* Retrieve the list of domains, clean up duplicates and check if sites exist (if redirects occur, we assume that the site is dead).
* All such rules can be merged into one file, convert them to exception rules and import as custom filter. Then go down the list and check if the rules are needed (other types of problems not related to these rules are skipped).
* If the site is dead - add domains in the comment below. Then we will remove them from the filters.

In order not to overlap with other filter maintainers, it is desirable to perform batch rule replacement via pull-requests (5-10 rules per PR).

### Important
It should be checked with a Dutch or German VPN, because otherwise the cookie usage messages may not appear.

comment.body:
Dead domain: `JERUSALEMONLINE.com`
No records found.

It looks like also `movieplayer.it#$#html { overflow: visible !important; } ` rule can be removed.
Otherwise, I suggest moving it to
```
! If scrolling is blocked after applying
! #%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.iubenda-cs-customize-btn')
```

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.16.0 (4542)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.youtube.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard German filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

It looks like ticket was misunderstood: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/170326

This report is about an unblocked Cookie Pop-up that is normaly handled by this filterlist: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/tree/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections

I did not mention any history whatever profil thing. It's about the Cookie Pop-up

Currently it is not filtered. My previous ticket even has two Thumb up as other users have the same issue.

</details>

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.16.0 (4542)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.youtube.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard German filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

It looks like ticket was misunderstood: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/170326

This report is about an unblocked Cookie Pop-up that is normaly handled by this filterlist: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/tree/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections

I did not mention any history whatever profil thing. It's about the Cookie Pop-up

Currently it is not filtered. My previous ticket even has two Thumb up as other users have the same issue.
